TopicTitle: C7 Airliner Re-textures and CFG edits

Articles.Content:
I recently today decided we needed better C7 airliner parts. I then started to re-texture C7 parts to be like airliners. I don\'t currently have anything done yet, so stay tuned to this thread for updates on my first mod! Premission has been given by C7 so when I get home later today I will upload the MK3 Fuselage Full part!

MK3 Fuselage Half

To be finished

MK3 Fuselage Full

To be finished

I take it you have C7\'s permission to release these?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I am awaiting response from C7 to see if I can release these publicly.
I\'ve made some too. I\'ll ask C7 if I can release them.

I\'ve made some too. I\'ll ask C7 if I can release them.

I have already PM\'ed him and I am waiting a response.
When he responded to me he told me texture and cfg edits were fine so long as credit was given.
